metadata.title: CVE-2017-14160 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The bark_noise_hybridmp function in psy.c in Xiph.Org libvorbis 1.3.5allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds accessand application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via acrafted mp4 file.

criterions.comment: libvorbis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
